answers.answer: I have the same thing my feet have been like that for the past wk im 38 wks and if i press on my feet i can see the indentation i know its a lot of swelling its horrible doc said its normal
Is there same swelling in the mornings?
Yes. Same swelling all day along and my hands are so swollen that will can't close them.

My doctor told me that if my feet are swollen mid day and at night that's fine but if the swelling from the night before is still there in the morning than that's bad. You may have preeclampsia. Talk to your doctor hun.
Since the swelling is pitting it should be taken more seriously as a sign of preeclampsia. Your doc can take your blood pressure, check urine for protein and other testing can be done.

All of this happens with me, as well. Indentions, it not going away by morning, lasting all day even if I'm not on my feet. Doctor also says I'm fine. Today, they were the worst they've ever been and around some of my toe nails started bleeding. We'll see what the doc has to say about that one, but I feel like that probably should NOT happen :(
Yes, my swelling is bad as well. I'm swollen day, noon, and night. I pray that I don't have preclampsia. I go to the doctor today & I will surely inquire.
Yes, my swelling is bad as well. I'm swollen day, noon, and night. I pray that I don't have preclampsia. I go to the doctor today & I will surely inquire.

I've had swelling bad, especially in my feet and legs. It hurts to stand. Shoes don't fit. Can't touch my feet. Dr said this is normal. BP and urine test normal. Drinking a ton of water. Just a part of pregnancy for me I guess.
Have you guys propping up your feet when your not on them??? It worked for me. ....

question: How much swelling is too much swelling??Tonight my husband was rubbing my feet and when he got done there was a indention where his thumb was.I know that if I call the doctor they will say the same thing that they always do but I'm started to get worried.
title: Too much swelling???
